page.title: 09LANDSCAPE CHANGES
page.content: LANDSCAPE CHANGES HAYWARDS HEATH IS RAPIDLY CHANGING, MORE PLANNING PERMISSION IS BEING GIVEN AND NICE OPEN GRASSLANDS AND WOODS MAY SOON BE HOUSES.THIS SEEMS TO BE HAPPENING IN THE AREA TO THE NORTHWEST OF THE JUNCTION OF LEWES ROAD AND SNOWDROP LANE. I THINK THAT THIS WOULD BE A SHAME AS THAT AREA IS NICE AND QUIET AND HAS LOTS OF WILDLIFE LIKE GREY SQUIRRELS, PHEASANTS, RABBITS AND OTHER ANIMALS. IN A FEW YEARS TIME THERE MAY BE HOUSES ON LYOTH COMMON ASTHERE ARE PLANS TO BUILD ON IT.NEAR LYOTH LANE THERE WAS A NURSERY WHICH IS NOW A ROW OF HOUSES. THE NURSERY WAS CALLED ORCHID NURSERY AND THE ROAD WHERE THR NURSERY WAS IS NAMED AFTER IT.
